Usage
=====

.. _installation:

Installation
------------

| To use MTE code, clone from `github <https://github.com/AgnesHendrickx/MTE/>`_. 
| To run all (optimized) setups for case study Mount Etna (reproducing) field sites use ``script_etna_full``.
| Make sure to have python3 and gnuplot installed and updated

.. code-block:: console

   ./script_etna_full > opla
